nodes.text: Ardot was a male Human infantry commander of the reconstituted Sith Empire's forces at the Ilum Jedi Temple during the Galactic War. Stationed before the Temple's ray shield-protected entrance at the Battle of Ilum in 3640 BBY, he was killed by Galactic Republic forces that laid siege to the Imperial occupants of the Jedi Temple from Ilum's Eastern Ice Shelf. At the time, Ardot wielded a large broad-bladed vibrosword in each hand.

Infantry Commander Ardot appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion-difficulty NPC on Ilum. Though not involved in any quests, killing him is required to complete a Republic-side achievement.
